title: League Installation & Error 1935 w/ Prerequisite
body:
Hi! I recently received a new laptop and tried to reinstall League on it. When I did, I kept getting these two errors.
http://imgur.com/kA6VxDf
http://imgur.com/PYz1TM4
I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling Microsoft Visual C++ 2005, but it gives me the same error (first picture). I also tried searching up other solutions, but they didn't seem to work for me. In addition, I had reset my laptop as well in hopes for the problem to be solved.  I'm not too sure what to do since I'm not a very technical person, so please help! 

Thank you so much!

replies.body:
This issue often happens if you haven't installed all the latest Windows updates. I recommend running a round of updates, then reinstalling Visual C++ 2005 with [this version.](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3B4wJJ9M-cannot-install-error-1935-windows-10


Riot does not care about their game anymore man, do not invest in RP, just play for free, they can't even help players download their game, I was having this issue, found this, hope it helps, since Riot won't do shit.
